description:
Soft and cozy, this beanie will help keep you and your ideas nice and warm. Made from a recycled nylon blend, the City Plush beanie is a fleecy take on the classic watch cap, and it’s great.

  • Recycled nylon holds onto your warmth and dries quickly
  • One size fits most, so be careful, your friends might try and “borrow” it
name: The North Face City Plush Beanie - Unisex
